mapper.insert: insert into t_series(series_name, series_ename, of_origin, is_use, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by) values(#{seriesName}, #{seriesEname}, #{ofOrigin}, #{isUse}, now(), 'system', now(), 'system')
mapper.select: select series_id, series_name, series_ename, of_origin, (select brand_name from t_brand where brand_id = t_series.of_origin) as of_origin_name, is_use, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y年%m月%d日 %T') as createDateFormat, date_format(update_date, '%Y年%m月%d日 %T') as updateDateFormat from t_series where series_id = #{seriesId}
